name: MIS Incidents by Prisoner
description:
Incidents that have occurred at establishments by the type of incident and the prisoner.
INC0005 v00.00.03 Last Modified: 02/09/08

dataset.name: Main Data Query
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INCIDENT_DATE_, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID)) AS NUMBER_OF_INCIDENTS, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID AS INCIDENT_NUMBER, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('pbenson') AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('pbenson') AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A8749AA') AND ((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-12-2008 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('13-01-2009 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) GROUP BY AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY'), INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC), AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_DATE_, NUMBER_OF_INCIDENTS, INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INCIDENT_NUMBER, SURNAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
